alert.note: Alert for Southern Queens (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Statement issued January 28 at 11:35AM EST until January 29 at 6:00AM EST by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD STATEMENT IN EFFECT LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Up to one half foot of inundation above ground level expected in vulnerable areas near the waterfront and shoreline. * WHERE...Southern Queens County. * WHEN...Late tonight. * IMPACTS...Brief minor flooding of vulnerable locations, particularly waterfront and shoreline communities on the north side of the Rockaways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Brief minor flooding of vulnerable locations, particularly waterfront and shoreline communities on the north side of the Rockaways for the Saturday evening high tides is possible as well. There is potential for more widespread minor coastal flooding along Jamaica Bay with the Sunday morning high tide.
info.instruction: Do not drive through flooded roadways.
